Cape_Coral.WTLQ-FM:
WTLQ-FM is a commercial radio station located in Punta Rassa, Florida, broadcasting to the Fort Myers, Florida area on 97.7 FM. WTLQ-FM airs a Hispanic urban music format branded as "Latino 97.7".
